snippet.title: Amber Heard says Jason Momoa's pranks drove her crazy | Daily Celebrity News | Splash TV
snippet.description:
The 32-year-old actress and Jason had "so much fun" during the 'Aquaman' shoot, but she also found his demand for attention to be tiring at times.

SUBSCRIBE NOW : https://goo.gl/JaLP0U

Amber Heard admits Jason Momoa's pranks drove her "crazy" while they were filming 'Aquaman'.

The 32-year-old actress and Jason had "so much fun" during the 'Aquaman' shoot, but she also found his demand for attention to be tiring at times.

Amber told 'Good Morning America': "We have so much fun together, but he is allergic to being ignored. I'm a bookworm. I love to read, so whenever there's a break on set, I like to read. He quickly learned ... so he ripped out the pages of my book so I'd pay attention to him, and it would drive me crazy because I'd have 30 pages left and they'd be gone."

Amber also revealed that because the crew knew how much she loved to read between takes they made her a special book bag out of her costume material so she could have her novels within easy reach.

The Hollywood star gushed: "Wardrobe made me a book bag built out of the green screen material so that I could sling it over me and carry it around and bring out my book."
